name: timestamp
title: Timestamp
description: A simple Raycast extension which puts timestamp into clipboard. Formatted in ISO 8601 standard kebab case.
author: nball

commands.name: timestamp
commands.title: Timestamp
commands.description: Puts current timestamp (ISO 8601 standard kebab case) into clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
